reviewText: I bought this as a birthday gift for my mother and she LOVED them. This is a 5 disc box set (2 discs of The First 48; 3 discs of Crime 360). If you or your loved ones like investigate crime series, then this is the ideal gift.

My boyfriend and I spend alot of time watching Crime 360 and The First 48 together, so when it came time to choose a Father's Day Gift for him I decided to purchase this box set.  When he opened the gift his face lit up and he said, "This is the best Father's Day Gift Ever!"

Thank you, Amazon :)
